attributes.additional_details: Local people need this A&E department in CGH, Gloucester is busy enough already, adding patients to this by closing Cheltenham A&E will only cause more pain, suffering or unnecessary death and expense of discharged in the early hours, a taxi from GRH back to Cheltenham is around £25/£30.
attributes.background: Save Cheltenham General Hospital A&E from closing because the nearest hospital is 10 miles away in Gloucester.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be a decision for Gloucestershire Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust.

You could raise the issue with the NHS Trust. You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.gloshospitals.nhs.uk/contact-us/get-in-touch/

You could also ask your local MP to raise the issue on your behalf. You can find out who your MP is, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/

You could start a new petition calling for an action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, for example a petition calling for increased funding for Accident and Emergency Services in your area.
